sentence: Democrat Stacey Abrams and former Republican U.S. Sen. David Perdue found themselves in an unlikely alliance last week after Georgia's Republican governor, Brian Kemp, backed a rule change that could benefit his election chances and not for the first time.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Stacey Abrams, David Perdue in unlikely alliance after Brian Kemp changes election rules again
